column2: Can attack creatures the turn it enters without spending AP
Enters in defence mode. Must be attacked first while in defence mode
Frozen creatures cannot attack until the next turn cycle.
50% chance to miss attacks against this creature.
Also deals damage to the creatures that attack it
This creature gains health whenever it deals damage
When this creature is attacked, attack back
Put a creature onto the battlefield
Turn creatures face down and randomise their position, they can still be attacked.
